mapper.insert: insert into mc_tbl(mc_email, mc_password, mc_name, mc_phone, mc_zipcode, mc_addr, mc_deaddr) values(#{mc_email}, #{mc_password}, #{mc_name}, #{mc_phone}, #{mc_zipcode}, #{mc_addr}, #{mc_deaddr})
mapper.select: select mc_email from mc_tbl where mc_email=#{mc_email}
select mc_email, mc_password, mc_name, mc_regdate from mc_tbl where mc_email=#{mc_email}
select mc_email, mc_regdate, mc_updatedate , mc_name, mc_zipcode, mc_addr, mc_deaddr, mc_phone from mc_tbl where mc_email=#{mc_email}
mapper.update: update mc_tbl set mc_email=#{mc_email}, mc_updatedate=now(), mc_name=#{mc_name}, mc_zipcode=#{mc_zipcode}, mc_addr=#{mc_addr}, mc_deaddr=#{mc_deaddr}, mc_phone=#{mc_phone} where mc_email=#{mc_email}
mapper.select: select mc_email from mc_tbl where mc_name=#{mc_name} and mc_phone=#{mc_phone}
